=======
CHANGES
=======

0.1.3 (2008-07-31)
------------------

- Fixed `setup.py` to be on par with the latest layout.

- Fixed deprecation warnings, since the session API was moved to
  ``zope.session``.


0.1.2 (2007-08-13)
------------------

- Move source to svn.zope.org.


0.1.1 (2007-08-13)
------------------

- Fixed dependency on `lovely.memcached`.
